title: Rajani raja Jisu rajaya sari jafwibai
lyrics:
Rajani raja Jisu rajaya sari jafwibai
Bwithelhem hadorni goaliao Mariamni gwrbwao
Sa- Re- Ga, Ga- Ma- Pa- Pa- Dha- Ni- Sa

(A)
Laokhar fwra fwtharao rongjaswdwng honwi
Jisu Gothokhou naodra sayao
Gugrupnanwi honwi khulumdwng.
Nwngni angnibw nokhorao
Sarifwibai dinwi Jisua-2

(B)
Lama dinthibwgou hatorkhia
Sanja deshni gwnwkhw fwrkhou
Fwiwi fwiwi sofwibai Bwithelhemni Goaliao
Usaobadao Herod rajaya
Gurlab-gutab gikhrongnanwi -2
